page.title: 14WILLOUGHBY CHURCH
page.content: Mr Bookless holds services in Willoughby Church nearly every Sunday. Mr Bookless is responsible for three churches.They are Willoughby, Wysall and Widmerpool.He has one helper in each of these three villages. In Wysall and Widmerpool his helper is his wife who is a deaconess. But in Willoughby Church he has Mr. Dickinson, a lay reader to help him. The average church attendance every Sunday is about 25 to 30 people.Services include Morning Prayer, Holy Communion, Evening Prayer and Family Service. The Holiday Club for children and young people is run jointly by the Anglican and Methodist churches in August.Sunday School is held every fortnight for the children in the village.
